alert.note: Alert for Eastern Baranof Island and Southern Admiralty Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 03 at 1:35PM AKST until February 03 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Wet snow and periods of freezing rain. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Angoon. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Accumulating snow is expected to continue for the Central Inner Channels through this evening before a transition to rain occurs. Confidence remains low on the exact timing of the change over to rain; which could greatly affect total snowfall amounts. Freezing rain may mix in at times; especially before a transition to plain rain.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Baranof Island and Southern Admiralty Island
